---
category: news
title: "Those who rely on Apple Voice Control say it needs work"
excerpt: "Voice Control was unveiled to much fanfare on stage at Apple's WWDC developer conference in 2019. It was fortunate timing as Mac users had just been burned after Nuance, the leading player in voice dictation, dropped its Dragon speech to text software from the Mac, frustrated – it was rumored – with the strict limits Apple sets on its APIs."
